sentence.Network_cn: 同志们, 我们的军队数不胜数.

sentence.Network_en: Numberless recent massacres were still vivid in their recollection.
sentence.Network_cn: 近来那些不可胜数的屠杀,在他们的头脑中记忆犹新.

sentence.Network_en: Practically every rock outcrop shows numberless joints.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际上所有岩石的露头都显示许许多多的节理.

帮忙翻译下三个单词，谢了 - 已解决 -... ... predestined 命中注定的， 设定的 numberless 数不尽的无数的 treasure 宝贝珍贵物.
uncountablenumberless无数的，没有房号的--This is a numberless room.

list.abs: in numberless rooms we stretch ourselves and sleep ., 在无数房间里我们摊开四肢睡去.
we can see numberless grains of sand in a windy day ., 在风天 , 我们能看到无数沙粒.
there are numberless stars in the sky ., 天空中有无数的星星.
numberless yachts on the sea of barcelona ., 巴塞罗那海上的无数游艇.

entry.def: If there are numberless things, there are too many to be counted.

example.ex: ...numberless acts of personal bravery by firefighters and rescue workers.
example.tran: 消防员和救援人员数不清的英勇行为

auth_sentence.content: But in his family, as in the Crawleys and numberless less-glamorous families, sides were taken.
auth_sentence.res_content: But in his family, as in the Crawleys and numberless less-glamorous families, sides were taken.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But in his family, as in the Crawleys and numberless less-glamorous families, sides were taken.

auth_sentence.content: The word "genocide" and the images of the nameless and numberless dead left too much to the imagination.
auth_sentence.res_content: The word "genocide" and the images of the nameless and numberless dead left too much to the imagination.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The word "genocide" and the images of the nameless and numberless dead left too much to the imagination.

auth_sentence.content: The things of the world are numberless, and they are all equal, and interesting.
auth_sentence.res_content: The things of the world are numberless, and they are all equal, and interesting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The things of the world are numberless, and they are all equal, and interesting.
